00011 CLoadMenu::CLoadMenu(Uint8 dlg_theme, CSavedGame &SavedGame) :
00012 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00013 m_SavedGame(SavedGame)
00014 {
00015  std::string text = "";
00016  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(22, 22, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN, m_dlg_theme);
00017 
00018  // Load the state-file list
00019  std::vector<std::string> StateFileList = m_SavedGame.getSlotList();
00020 
00021  for(Uint32 i=1;i<=20;i++)
00022  {
00023   if(i <= StateFileList.size())
00024   {
00025    text = StateFileList.at(i-1);
00026    mp_Dialog->m_name = text;
00027   }
00028   else
00029    text = EMPTY_STRING;
00030 
00031   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, i, text);
00032  }
00033 }
00034 
00035 void CLoadMenu::processSpecific()
00036 {
00037  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)
00038  {
00039   if(mp_Dialog->m_name == "     EMPTY       ")
00040   {
00041    //TODO: Message saying can't load, it is empty.  Also, we need to add a check to
00042    // see if it is corrupt, or something to prevent old saves from crashing due to incompatibility.
00043   }
00044   else
00045   {
00046    m_SavedGame.prepareLoadGame(m_selection + 1);
00047    m_mustclose = true;
00048   }
00049   m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00050  }
00051 }
00052 
00053 CLoadMenu::~CLoadMenu()
00054 {
00055  if(mp_Dialog) delete mp_Dialog;
00056  mp_Dialog = NULL;
00057 }
